¬´Norske¬ª Celtic videre i Europa etter bortebragd
Fem minutter p√• overtid scoret innbytter Olivier Ntcham m√•let som ga Celtic-seier borte mot Lazio i Europa League.
07 Nov 2019, 20:45 by NTB

LAZIO- CELTIC 1‚Äì2

Kristoffer Ajer, Mohamed Elyounoussi og deres lagkamerater kunne feire Celtics f√∏rste borteseier i Italia noensinne, i det 13. fors√∏ket. Mindre lykkelig var rogalendingen Valon Berisha. Det var hans feilpasning og balltap p√• egen halvdel som banet vei for vinnerm√•let.
Odsonne √âdouard suste fram p√• h√∏yresiden og skar inn i feltet f√∏r han passet til Ntcham, som scoret vinnerm√•let.
Bare noen minutter tidligere hadde Berisha en stor sjanse til √• gi Lazio ledelsen, men Fraser Forster reddet hans skudd og slo ballen ut.
Lazio hadde tatt en tidlig ledelse ved Ciro Immobile, men James Forrest utlignet f√∏r pause.
Lazio dominerte kampen og spolerte store sjanser, men Celtic hadde ogs√• sine tilbud. Blant annet hadde Edouard en kjempemulighet framspilt av Elyounoussi i det 76. minutt. Avslutningen gikk s√• vidt utenfor.

Fakta: Europa League torsdag, 4. runde:


Gruppe D:


Rosenborg ‚Äì Sporting Lisboa (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (√òsterrike) ‚Äì PSV Eindhoven (Nederland) 4-1 (0-1).


Gruppe A:


APOEL (Kypros) ‚Äì Qarabag (Kasakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) ‚Äì Sevilla (Spania) 2-5 (0-4).


Gruppe B:


FC K√∏benhavn (Danmark) ‚Äì Dinamo Kiev (Ukraina) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Sveits) ‚Äì Malm√∂ (Sverige) 0-0.


Gruppe C:


Basel (Sveits) ‚Äì Getafe (Spania) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russland) ‚Äì Trabzonspor (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-0).


Gruppe E:


Cluj (Romania) ‚Äì Rennes (Frankrike) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italia) ‚Äì Celtic (Skottland) 1-2 (1-1).


Gruppe F:


Standard Li√®ge (Belgia) ‚Äì Eintracht Frankfurt (Tyskland) 2-1 (0-0).
Spilt onsdag: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) ‚Äì Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Gruppe G:


Feyenoord (Nederland) ‚Äì Young Boys (Sveits) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Skottland) ‚Äì Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Gruppe H:


Espanyol (Spania) ‚Äì Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Ungarn) ‚Äì CSKA Moskva (Russland) 0-0.


Gruppe I:


Olexandrija (Ukraina) ‚Äì Saint-√âtienne (Frankrike) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Tyskland) ‚Äì Gent (Belgia) 1-3 (1-0).


Gruppe J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Tyskland) ‚Äì Roma (Italia) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (√òsterrike) ‚Äì Basaksehir (Tyrkia) 0-3 (0-0).


Gruppe K:


Braga (Portugal) ‚Äì Besiktas (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) ‚Äì Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Gruppe L:


Astana (Kasakhstan) ‚Äì AZ Alkmaar (Nederland) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) ‚Äì Partizan Beograd (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).


Rosenborgs vonde rekke fortsetter - n√¶rmer seg negativ rekord



Olivier Ntcham scorer Celtics vinnerm√•l p√• overtid borte mot Lazio i Europa League.üì∑ Gregorio Borgia, AP / NTB scanpix

Verdens beste
9000 Celtic-fans hadde reist til Roma for √• f√∏lge det som ble betegnet som litt av et hatoppgj√∏r etter at tilhengerskarene var i tottene p√• hverandre, s√¶rlig verbalt, i forbindelse med klubbens m√∏te i Glasgow for to uker siden. To av de tilreisende skottene havnet p√• sykehus etter √• ha blitt knivstukket natt til torsdag.
‚Äì Vi har verdens beste tilhengere. De kom hit i tusenvis fordi de elsker √• se Celtic spille og vinne, sa manager Neil Lennon etter kampen.
‚Äì Det er stort √• ha kvalifisert oss med to kamper igjen √• spille. Det er for tidlig √• si hvor langt vi kan n√• i denne turneringen, men vi kan v√¶re en vanskelig motstander for hvem som helst.
‚Äì N√• er v√•re sjanser til √• g√• videre sv√¶rt sm√•, men man skal aldri si aldri i fotballen, sa Lazio-trener Simone Inzaghi. Laget hans er seks poeng bak rumenske Cluj, som etter sin 1-0-seier over Rennes er gruppetoer poenget bak Celtic.

Nordmann med scoring - tok storseier i Europa

Tre ble klare
Ajer og Elyounoussi spilte hele kampen for Celtic, som var ett av tre lag som sikret avansement i tidligkampene torsdag. Sevilla (vant 5-2 over Dudelange) og Basel (2-1 over Getafe) var de to andre.
Mens Ajer og Elyounoussi kunne juble, gikk det tyngre for andre nordmenn som var i aksjon samtidig. Alexander S√∏rloth spilte en halvtime som innbytter da Trabzonspor tapte 1-3 borte mot Krasnodar.
FC K√∏benhavn, med Sten Grytebust p√• benken, topper fortsatt tabellen i sin gruppe etter 1-1 hjemme mot Dinamo Kiev. Jo Inge Berget og hans Malm√∂ jaget forgjeves et vinnerm√•l borte mot Lugano, men er etter 0-0 fortsatt p√• 3.-plass i den jevne gruppe B, ett poeng bak tetduoen.
text:
"Norwegian" Celtic continues in Europe after the disappearance
Five minutes into overtime, Olivier Ntcham scored the goal which gave Celtic victory away to Lazio in the Europa League.
07 Nov 2019, 20:45 by NTB

LAZIO-CELTIC 1‚Äì2

Kristoffer Ajer, Mohamed Elyounoussi and their teammates could celebrate Celtic's first away win in Italy ever, in the 13th attempt. Less happy was the roe landlady Valon Berisha. It was his mismatch and ball loss on his own half that paved the way for the winning goal.
Odsonne √âdouard swung to the right and cut into the box before passing to Ntcham, who scored the winning goal.
Just minutes earlier, Berisha had a great chance to give Lazio the lead, but Fraser Forster saved his shot and knocked the ball out.
Lazio had taken an early lead at Ciro Immobile, but James Forrest equalized before the break.
Lazio dominated the match and spoiled big chances, but Celtic also had their offers. Among other things, Edouard had a great opportunity by Elyounoussi in the 76th minute. The ending went well outside.

Facts: Europa League Thursday, 4th round:


Group D:


Rosenborg - Sporting Lisbon (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (Austria) - PSV Eindhoven (Netherlands) 4-1 (0-1).


Group A:


APOEL (Cyprus) - Qarabag (Kazakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) - Seville (Spain) 2-5 (0-4).


Group B:


FC Copenhagen (Denmark) - Dinamo Kiev (Ukraine) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Switzerland) - Malm√∂ (Sweden) 0-0.


Group C:


Basel (Switzerland) - Getafe (Spain) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russia) - Trabzonspor (Turkey) 3-1 (2-0).


Group E:


Cluj (Romania) - Rennes (France) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italy) - Celtic (Scotland) 1-2 (1-1).


Group F:


Standard Liege (Belgium) - Eintracht Frankfurt (Germany) 2-1 (0-0).
Played Wednesday: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) - Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Group G:


Feyenoord (Netherlands) - Young Boys (Switzerland) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Scotland) - Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Group H:


Espanyol (Spain) - Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Hungary) - CSKA Moscow (Russia) 0-0.


Group I:


Olexandrija (Ukraine) - Saint-√âtienne (France) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Germany) - Ghent (Belgium) 1-3 (1-0).


Group J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Germany) - Rome (Italy) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (Austria) - Basaksehir (Turkey) 0-3 (0-0).


Group K:


Braga (Portugal) - Besiktas (Turkey) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) - Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Group L:


Astana (Kazakhstan) - AZ Alkmaar (Netherlands) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) - Partizan Belgrade (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).


Rosenborg's bad line continues - approaching the negative record



Olivier Ntcham scores Celtic's overtime goal away from Lazio in the Europa League.üì∑ Gregorio Borgia, AP / NTB scanpix

The world's best
9000 Celtic fans had traveled to Rome to follow what was termed as a bit of a hate show after fans crowded into each other, especially verbally, in connection with the club's Glasgow meeting two weeks ago. Two of the traveling Scots ended up in hospital after being stabbed last night.
- We have the world's best supporters. They came here for thousands because they love to see Celtic play and win, manager Neil Lennon said after the game.
- It is great to have qualified with two games left to play. It is too early to say how far we can go in this tournament, but we can be a tough opponent for anyone.
"Now our chances of moving forward are very small, but you should never say never in football," said Lazio coach Simone Inzaghi. His team is six points behind Romanian Cluj, who after his 1-0 victory over Rennes is the group leader behind Celtic.

Nordmann with scoring - took big win in Europe

Three became clear
Ajer and Elyounoussi played the entire match for Celtic, which was one of three teams that secured advancement in the early matches on Thursday. Seville (won 5-2 over Dudelange) and Basel (2-1 over Getafe) were the other two.
While Ajer and Elyounoussi could cheer, it was more difficult for other Norwegians who were in action at the same time. Alexander S√∏rloth played half an hour as substitutes as Trabzonspor lost 1-3 away to Krasnodar.
FC Copenhagen, with Sten Grytebust on the bench, still tops the table in their group after 1-1 at home against Dinamo Kiev. Jo Inge Berget and his Malm√∂ chase in vain a winning goal away from Lugano, but after 0-0 is still in 3rd place in the regular Group B, one point behind the tetduo.
